summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from July 1, 2020, discussing Ghislaine Maxwell's siblings. It contains a list of her siblings with their names, dates of birth, addresses, and travel information, compiled by FBI personnel. The document is significant for identifying Maxwell's family members and their potential locations during the investigation.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The central subject of the FBI's inquiry; the document is a list of her siblings compiled by the FBI.

persons.name: Christine Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as Ghislaine Maxwell's sibling with a DOB and address in Dallas, TX.

persons.name: Isabel Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as Ghislaine Maxwell's sibling with a DOB and address in Sausalito, CA.

persons.name: Karine Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as Ghislaine Maxwell's sibling, noted as deceased.

persons.name: Ann (Anne) Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as Ghislaine Maxwell's sibling, also known as Anne Holve, married to Lawrence Holve, with a UK passport and an outbound flight to the UK in 2015.

persons.name: Lawrence Holve
persons.context: Mentioned as the husband of Ann (Anne) Maxwell (Anne Holve).

persons.name: Kevin Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as Ghislaine Maxwell's sibling with a UK passport and an inbound flight to Boston from London in February 2020.

persons.name: Michael Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as Ghislaine Maxwell's sibling, noted as deceased.

persons.name: Ian Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as Ghislaine Maxwell's sibling with a UK passport and an outbound flight to London from Boston in December 2017.

persons.name: Philip Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as Ghislaine Maxwell's sibling with no identified US residence or travel history.

persons.name: Meder, R. (NY) (FBI)
persons.context: FBI agent who compiled and forwarded the list of Ghislaine Maxwell's siblings to colleagues.

persons.name: Young, Amanda N. (NY) (FBI)
persons.context: FBI agent who was the recipient of the initial email containing the sibling list from Meder.

events.title: Ann Maxwell's flight to UK
events.description: Ann (Anne) Maxwell (Anne Holve) had an outbound flight to the United Kingdom.

events.title: Kevin Maxwell's flight to Boston
events.description: Kevin Maxwell had an inbound flight to Boston from London.

events.title: Ian Maxwell's flight to London
events.description: Ian Maxwell had an outbound flight to London from Boston.

keyFacts: The FBI compiled a detailed list of Ghislaine Maxwell's eight siblings in July 2020 as part of their investigation.
Several of Maxwell's siblings (Ann, Kevin, Ian) hold UK passports and have travel history between the US and UK, with specific flight dates recorded.
Two siblings, Karine Maxwell and Michael Maxwell, are noted as deceased.
The document shows internal FBI coordination (agents Meder and Young) on gathering family information about Ghislaine Maxwell.
The email discusses the challenge of locating some siblings and determining appropriate phrasing for a letter, indicating ongoing investigative steps.
